meta.name: Finance Data
meta.description: 数据金融风格，红绿配色，适合股市分析、数据解读

base.container: background-color: #ffffff; color: #262626; font-family: 'SF Pro Display', -apple-system, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.7; padding: 16px;

header_window.style: background-color: #f0f0f0; border-bottom: 3px solid #e53935; padding: 10px 16px; margin-bottom: 20px; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: space-between;

headings.h2: background-color: #262626; color: #ffffff; padding: 10px 16px; font-size: 16px; font-weight: 600; margin: 20px 0 12px;
headings.h3: color: #e53935; font-size: 15px; font-weight: 600; margin: 18px 0 10px; display: flex; align-items: center;
headings.h1: background-color: #262626; color: #ffffff; padding: 10px 16px; font-size: 16px; font-weight: 600; margin: 20px 0 12px;
headings.h4: font-size: 15px; font-weight: bold; margin-bottom: 8px; color: #57606a; margin-top: 20px;

text.code_inline: background-color: #f5f5f5; color: #e53935; padding: 2px 5px; border-radius: 2px; font-family: monospace; font-weight: 600;

blocks.code_block: background-color: #1e1e1e; color: #00ff00; padding: 14px; border-radius: 4px; margin: 14px 0; font-size: 12px; font-family: 'JetBrains Mono', monospace; border-left: 3px solid #43a047;
blocks.quote_tip: background-color: #e8f5e9; border-left: 4px solid #43a047; color: #2e7d32; padding: 10px 14px; margin: 14px 0;
blocks.quote_warning: background-color: #ffebee; border-left: 4px solid #e53935; color: #c62828; padding: 10px 14px; margin: 14px 0;
blocks.quote_note: background-color: #e8f4fd; border-left: 4px solid #0969da; color: #0c3d6a; padding: 12px; margin-bottom: 15px; border-radius: 0 6px 6px 0;
blocks.quote_info: background-color: #def7ff; border-left: 4px solid #58a6ff; color: #0c447a; padding: 12px; margin-bottom: 15px; border-radius: 0 6px 6px 0;
blocks.quote_default: background-color: #f6f8fa; border-left: 4px solid #57606a; color: #57606a; padding: 12px; margin-bottom: 15px; border-radius: 0 6px 6px 0;
blocks.details: background-color: #f6f8fa; border: 1px solid #d0d7de; border-radius: 6px; padding: 12px; margin-bottom: 15px;
blocks.summary: font-weight: bold; cursor: pointer; color: #0969da; margin-bottom: 8px;

media.image_placeholder: background-color: #fafafa; border: 1px dashed #cccccc; color: #999999; padding: 18px; text-align: center; margin: 14px 0; font-size: 12px;
media.image: max-width: 100%; height: auto; display: block; margin: 15px 0; border-radius: 4px;

footer.style: margin-top: 30px; padding-top: 15px; border-top: 1px solid #e0e0e0; text-align: center; background-color: #f9f9f9; padding: 15px;

math.inline: background-color: #f6f8fa; padding: 2px 6px; border-radius: 4px; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-style: italic;
math.block: background-color: #f6f8fa; padding: 15px; border-radius: 6px; text-align: center; margin: 15px 0; overflow-x: auto; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif;
